hr.fer.ruazosa.coloredsettings
Class CameraPreview

java.lang.Object
  SurfaceView
      hr.fer.ruazosa.coloredsettings.CameraPreview

public class CameraPreview
extends SurfaceView

CameraPreview class, defines SurfaceHolder for camera view. Instantiates DrawOnTop class.

Author:
Tomislav
